title: Vasundhara Polki Jhumkaalu: Exquisite Heritage Earrings
materials: Fresh Water Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: These enchanting Jhumkaalu showcase traditional South Indian craftsmanship with vibrant enamel work in shades of green and pink. The delicate Polki diamonds are meticulously set in a closed setting, enhancing their natural brilliance. The Jhumka is adorned with a cluster of lustrous fresh water pearls, adding a touch of timeless elegance.
colors: White. The color palette is a classic combination often seen in traditional Telugu jewelry
occasions: and significant cultural events. Also suitable for adding a touch of heritage to modern ensembles.
description: These Jhumkaalu are a testament to enduring Indian artistry, blending heritage with contemporary appeal. The use of premium materials and expert craftsmanship ensures heirloom-quality jewelry that can be treasured for generations. The combination of Polki diamonds, vibrant enamel, and lustrous pearls creates a striking and unforgettable look.
